task.title: Removing uploaded images
task.shortdesc: By default, authenticated users can upload custom images to use as background. There is no limit to how many background images you can upload. To add a custom background, refer to and . Contact your server administrator if this option is unavailable.

context.p: After adding, you can either keep or remove the uploaded image from your library. You can view your library from Change background, which is accessible from the preview window and the in-meeting menu. You can only remove images when they are not in use. If the saved image is in use, then you must apply another background option before removing.
To remove an image that is in use, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Exit and go back to Change background.
Go to the image and then select X to remove.
